description: Join our intermediate Spanish class and improve your conversational skills. The class will cover various topics, vocabulary, and grammar exercises.
requirements: Basic understanding of Spanish grammar and vocabulary.

description: Join our advanced German class to enhance your German language skills. The class will focus on complex grammar, advanced vocabulary, and conversation practice.
requirements: Proficiency in German at an intermediate level.

description: Join our intermediate Japanese class to further develop your Japanese language skills. The class will focus on advanced vocabulary, reading comprehension, and conversation practice.
requirements: Basic understanding of Japanese grammar and vocabulary.

description: Join our Business English class to enhance your language skills in a professional context. The class will cover business vocabulary, email writing, presentations, and more.
Join our advanced Russian grammar class to deepen your understanding of Russian grammar rules and structures. The class will cover complex topics, exercises, and practical applications.
requirements: Proficiency in Russian at an intermediate level.

description: Join our beginner Italian class and start learning the basics of the Italian language. The class will cover essential vocabulary, grammar, and conversational skills.
requirements: No prior knowledge of Italian required.
